document_data.mainbody:
uhrell Caah was an agent of the Emerald Enclave in Phlan during the Tyranny of Dragons.
Buhrell was an agent of the Emerald Enclave sent to Phlan. He went to Madame Freonas Tea Kettle searching for a powerful and dangerous magical item. With the help of some adventurers  he managed to locate and recover the item.
